Description: A pale blue cotton textile with weft stripes of dark blue, red and green, and with fringes of plaited warp threads at either end. Such textiles are often used as bedspreads.
Acquisition notes: Af1993,24.1 to 15 were collected by Christopher Spring, and were described in the purchase book as "a collection of textiles, mainly from the towns of Akhmim, Nagada and Isna in Upper Egypt, acquired during a period of fieldwork in Egypt from October to December 1993."
